title: Pset_DuctSegmentOccurrence
description: Duct segment occurrence attributes attached to an instance of IfcDuctSegment.

InteriorRoughnessCoefficient.title: InteriorRoughnessCoefficient
InteriorRoughnessCoefficient.description: The interior roughness of the duct fitting material.

HasLiner.title: HasLiner
HasLiner.description: TRUE if the fitting has interior duct insulating lining, FALSE if it does not.

Color.title: Color
Color.description:
The color of the duct segment.

Note: This is typically used for any duct segments with a painted surface which is not otherwise specified as a covering.
